H0.text: If something is hamiform it is shaped like a ‘what’. Claw

H1.text: If something is hamiform it is shaped like a ‘what’. Sickle

H2.text: If something is hamiform it is shaped like a ‘what’. Scimitar

H3.text: If something is hamiform it is shaped like a ‘what’. Hook

A4.text: A hook is a tool consisting of a length of material, typically metal, that contains a portion that is curved/bent back or has a deeply grooved indentation, which serves to grab, latch or in any way attach itself onto another object.
